divs: sighting detailssimilar flight path as june 16, 2009 sighting and side lighting appearance from 2000 feet away across the allegheny river. coming from direction of pa turnpike quarter a mile away (se). flew over famous oakmont country club golf course and headed across river to the west approximately. video of it flying in hd is on my youtube channel: seeingufospa http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=vxpwa-uon5k detail in stills on video not good so here's some posted here so others can see and compare to what they might be seeing. these are all of the same craft.
Summary: Harmar(ville): Strange Triangle over Oakmont Country Club
